name: atode-gui
description: 後で読む記事管理ツール

scripts.prepare: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (!fs.existsSync('dist')) fs.mkdirSync('dist'); const files = [['src-web/main.js', 'dist/bundle.js'], ['src-web/index.html', 'dist/index.html'], ['src-web/styles.css', 'dist/styles.css']]; files.forEach(([src, dest]) => fs.copyFileSync(src, dest));"
scripts.prepare:unix: mkdir -p dist && cp src-web/main.js dist/bundle.js && cp src-web/index.html dist/index.html && cp src-web/styles.css dist/styles.css
scripts.prepare:windows: cmd /c "if not exist dist mkdir dist" && cmd /c "copy src-web\main.js dist\bundle.js >nul" && cmd /c "copy src-web\index.html dist\index.html >nul" && cmd /c "copy src-web\styles.css dist\styles.css >nul"
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('dist')) fs.rmSync('dist', {recursive: true});"
